title: Bug Splat problems
body: Just updated to windows 10 build 14393. Big update. Having bug splats like crazy now. Any fixes?

replies.body: You might have outdated drivers that can't render the game, so you gotta tune things up with your big OS update.  Try out the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure everything's in shape.  Test it out in a custom game too to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have updated the drivers and got netframe 3.5. Reinstalled League and turned off xbox live record. Running out of ideas. The resolution is the correct size so don't think it's that. Alright update. Just updated to the newer client. Didn't work so I ran as adminstrator. DirectX error and now it's loading. Any fixes to that? I have directx 12 installed

I appreciate that you've done so much, and it sucks that the problem continues.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can continue working with you individually on this.  You can also grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which can help with troubleshooting, but it will also grab some logs which you can attach to the ticket for context.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
